#Cogbot command line

= Introduction =

Cogbot.exe [opts]

 * -aiml          Runs just the AIML interpretor")]
 * -swipl         Runs just the SWIPL interpretor
 * -httpd <port>  Start bot HTTPD on Port
 * -nogui         Headless daemon operation
 * -lcd           Locally change the directory
 * --firstname <name>  Username first name
 * --lastname <name> Username last name
 * --password <password> User password
 * --tcpPort  <portnum> for the tcp (telnet) port
 * --tcpPortOffset <int> amount to increase the telnet prot for each successive bot
 * --tcpIPAddress <ip addr>  
 * simURL    <loginuri>   login URI for grid


= Headless server command line (from Program.cs) =

The cogbot server is usually started from Radegast

 * --lcd [Dir] Change the working directory
 * --noexcpt   Ignore exceptions
 * --aiml      Only the aiml interpretor
 * --plwin     Display a prolog top level
 * --swipl     DOUG?
 * --main      DOUG?
 * --noconfig 
 * --console
 * --nogui     don't start Radegast
